Package org.hyperledger.fabric.shim

This is the pacakge the supports the chaincode style of development.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Chaincode
    Defines methods that all chaincodes must implement.
    ChaincodeStub  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Chaincode.Response
    Wrapper around protobuf Response, contains status, message and payload.
    ResponseUtils  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Chaincode.Response.Status
    Chaincode.Response status enum.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ChaincodeException
    Contracts should use ChaincodeException to indicate when an error occurs in Smart Contract logic.

Package org.hyperledger.fabric.shim Description

This is the pacakge the supports the chaincode style of development.

The main interface to implement is org.hyperledger.fabric.shim#ChaincodeBase

See Also:
Developing Fabric Applications
